name: Slashing Thyme
description:
A newbie hero with nothing but a sword named "woodcutter" is on his way to a tavern for a drink. Upon arrival, he sees the tavern infested with vines. He dashes inside, aiming to save the day.  Alas, the growth of vines can't be suppressed...

Slashing Thyme is a classic hack&slash where you try to slice and dice your way as you try to level up as high as possible in a short amount of time. 

This game is a submission for 2021 GoGodotJam.
